farsketched_base.name: Farsketched
farsketched_base.about: Write prompts to make images, make up alternative prompts, and guess the truth!

gisticle_base.name: Gisticle
gisticle_base.about: Write prompts to make lists, make up alternative prompts, and guess the truth!

0.template: List the top 5 best {1}, don't explain why

1.template: List the top 5 most ridiculous ways to {1}, don't explain why
1.display: List the top 5 most ridiculous ways to...

2.template: List the top 5 most obvious signs {1}, don't explain why
2.display: List the top 5 most obvious signs...

3.template: List the top 5 reasons you should {1}, don't explain why
3.display: List the top 5 reasons you should...

common_language.name: Dear mom...
common_language.about: More language prompting, and fooling others with alternate prompts!

1.template: You won't believe this one weird trick to {1}!
1.display: You won't believe this one weird trick to...

poems.name: Poems
poems.about: Write prompts to make poems, make up alternative prompts, and guess the truth!

0.template: Write a haiku about {1}, but don't mention "{1}"

1.template: Write a heroic couplet about {1}, but don't mention "{1}"

3.template:
Complete the couplet.

Roses are red, {1},

4.template: Write a limerick about {1}, but don't mention "{1}"

5.template: Write a cinquain about {1}, but don't mention "{1}" (do not include the title).

6.template: Write a villanelle about {1}, but don't mention "{1}"

tresmojis_base.name: Tresmojis
tresmojis_base.about: Write prompts to make 3 emojis, make up alternative prompts, and guess the truth!

0.template: List 3 emojis to describe {1} (don't explain why)

1.template: List 3 emojis to describe {1} (don't explain why)
1.display: List 3 emojis to describe [an abstract noun]

2.template: List 3 emojis to describe {1} (don't explain why)
2.display: List 3 emojis to describe [a person's name]

3.template: List 3 emojis to describe {1} (don't explain why)

4.template: List 3 emojis to describe {1} (don't explain why)

movie_descriptions.name: Popcorn Time
movie_descriptions.about: Prompt the AI with a description, and it will name a movie. Make up an alternate description, and guess the truth!

0.display: Give a description, and I'll name a movie

think_tank_trivia.name: Think Tank Trivia
think_tank_trivia.about: Write multiple choice questions and guess what the AI picked!
think_tank_trivia.questionPreface: Select the best answer to the question.

think_tank_golden.name: Doggo Trivia
think_tank_golden.about: Write multiple choice questions and guess what the AI picked while it was pretending to be a dog!
think_tank_golden.questionPreface:
You are a golden retriever who loves humans.

Select the best answer to the question.

quip_globian.name: Globianism
quip_globian.about: Write answers to please the AI cult leader, receive points and commentary.
quip_globian.description: The high priest of a new religion called Globianism is judging their followers. Appease them to get points.

roundPrompts.0: What does it mean to be a true Globian?
roundPrompts.2: What is the root of all wisdom?
roundPrompts.4: What is the most despicable thing in the world?

0.content: You are the leader of a new religion called Globianism, instructing followers how to be better Globians.

1.content: You are the leader of a new religion called Globianism. You are cultish and believe you have absolute knowledge of the truth. Your followers will say things to demonstrate their understanding of the religion, and you will tell them how well they did by awarding points and giving commentary.

2.content: Hear me, followers! Which of you has something to say, to show you are a good Globian, for me to pass judgment?

mitm_base.name: Bot or Not?
mitm_base.about: Chat with your friend and guess when they get replaced by a bot!
mitm_base.description: Can you tell if you're talking to your friend?
